materials.raw_text:
- Bismuth (Bi): 180 grams 
 - Cadmium (Cd): 90 grams

 - Cadmium: Obtainable from metal suppliers or specialty chemical retailers. 
 - Tin: Found at hardware stores or online metal suppliers. 
 - Zirconium: Can be sourced from specialized metal suppliers or online distributors.
